body.h1: WSO2 Data Services Server (DSS) Documentation Index
body.p: Installation Guide : Gives basic steps on how to download, install, and run WSO2 Data Services Server using the binary distribution, and how to build WSO2 Data Services Server using the source distribution.
Quick Start Guide : Demonstrates data services sample covering the basic and the most common usage scenarios of the WSO2 Data Services Server - Message mediation and Service mediation.
User Guide : User guide provides information and instructions on the functionality of WSO2 Data Services Server UI console.
Deploying Samples : Provides step-by-step instructions on how to deploy the data services samples.
Data Services Clients : This sample demonstrates the usage of code-generated clients when used with data-services.
RDBMS Sample : Demonstrates how to use a sample RDBMS data service with the use of an relational databases.
RDF Sample : Demonstrates how to use a sample RDBMS data service with the use of an relational databases.
CSV Sample : Demonstrates how to use a sample CVS data service with the use of an comma-separated values (CSV) file.
Excel Sample : Demonstrates how to use a sample excel data service with the use of an excel document.
Nested Query Sample : Demonstrates how to use the data services nested query feature using a sample data service.
Batch Process Sample : Demonstrates how to use the data services batch processing feature using a sample data service.
Eventing Sample : Demostrates how to triger an event to notify a specific action by using a data service eventing sample.
Secure Service Sample : Demonstrates how a service client is used to access a secured data service.
File App Sample : Demonstrates file upload/download/preview application with the usage of several features.
XSLT Transformation Sample : Demostrate how users can transform data services results according to their need using a sample data service.
Distributed Transactions Sample : Demonstrates how to use the distributed transactions feature using a sample data service.
Forum : WSO2 Data Services Server Forum
Java Docs : Application Programing Interface of the Apache Synapse version used underneath the WSO2 Data Services Server. If you want to write advanced custom mediators, you will need this API.
External articles : A collection of external articles published on WSO2 Data Services Server.
The WSO2 Oxygen Tank Library : The Library contains articles, tutorials, presentations, and other knowledge base items published on The Oxygen Tank.
Wiki Space : This is the working Wiki for WSO2 Data Services Server.
